definition: Xie He (479-502), portrait painter from Qi of Southern dynasties 南齊
to thank/to apologize/to wither (of flowers, leaves etc)/to decline
awe-inspiring/abbr. for 赫茲|赫兹[he4 zi1], hertz (Hz)

sentences.english: Sheikh Abdel Maged agrees that the organization has moved far beyond its hierarchical origins.
sentences.chinese: 謝赫同意說，這個組織已經遠遠超出了它的等級根源。

sentences.english: Two months after his arrest Shaikh was sentenced to death.
sentences.chinese: 被捕後兩個月，謝赫被判處死刑。

sentences.english: That shayk had been buried since five hundred years.
sentences.chinese: 這位謝赫五百年前安葬在那裏。

sentences.english: A shaykh once visited a Sufi center, known as a khaniqah.
sentences.chinese: 一次，有個謝赫去拜訪一個著名的蘇菲道堂。

definition: Marcus Tullius Cicero (106-43 BC), famous Roman politician, orator and philosopher, murdered at the orders of Marc Anthony
Milton (name)/John Milton (1608-1674), English republican writer and poet, author of Paradise Lost
Liu Yi (-285), famous incorruptible official of Western Jin dynasty the Western Jin dynasty 西晉|西晋[Xi1 Jin4] (265-316)/Liu Yi (-412), general of Eastern Jin dynasty 東晉|东晋[Dong1 Jin4] (317-420)
Leonardo da Vinci (1452-1519), Italian Renaissance painter (Tw)
